question1.q: How long does it take to generate a video?
question1.a: Most videos are generated in 2-5 minutes, depending on length and complexity.

question2.a: We support MP4, MOV, and WebM formats with various resolution options.

question3.q: Can I edit the generated videos?
question3.a: Yes, you can make adjustments and refinements using our built-in editor.

question4.a: Yes, we offer a free trial with 3 video generations to get you started.

question5.a: We support English, Chinese, Japanese, and Spanish for both input and output.
